rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment neutrally describes actions and status ('continue on a weekly basis', 'under quarantine until further notice').
No moderate verb paired with significant scale/impact information.
This segment reports testing will continue and farms are under quarantine, containing no calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes ongoing surveillance ('Testing... will continue') and a control measure ('under quarantine').
